segment.source: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.

segment.source: Because this product can affect every computer in your organization, you might disrupt your entire network if you do not plan your deployment carefully.
segment.target: Because this product can affect every computer in your organization, you might disrupt your entire network if you do not plan your deployment carefully.

segment.source: However, if you plan your deployment carefully and manage it so that it meets your business needs, MBAM can help reduce your administrative overhead and total cost of ownership.
segment.target: However, if you plan your deployment carefully and manage it so that it meets your business needs, MBAM can help reduce your administrative overhead and total cost of ownership.

segment.source: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation thoroughly.
segment.target: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation thoroughly.

segment.source: Before you deploy it to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy it to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.

segment.source: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.
segment.target: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can find a downloadable version of this documentation and the MBAM Evaluation Guide at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=225356.
segment.target: You can find a downloadable version of this documentation and the MBAM Evaluation Guide at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=225356.

segment.source: This section of the MBAM Administrator’s Guide includes high-level information about MBAM to provide you with a basic understanding of the product before you begin the deployment planning.
segment.target: This section of the MBAM Administrator’s Guide includes high-level information about MBAM to provide you with a basic understanding of the product before you begin the deployment planning.

segment.source: Additional MBAM documentation can be found on the MBAM Documentation Resources Download page at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=258391.
segment.target: Additional MBAM documentation can be found on the MBAM Documentation Resources Download page at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=258391.
